about_the_game:
Build and govern a thriving Singapore in this city builder! Plan your city with tactical building placements, Recruit a powerful Cabinet, and secure Building Blueprints during heated parliament sessions. Rally citizen support to ensure re-election and shape your nation's future one term at a time!

Build Your Dream City

Strategically design your city by placing buildings in optimal locations to unlock their full potential. Experiment with a variety of building types, each offering unique benefits and possibilities.

Reap the Rewards

Score points at the end of each turn based on the strategic placement of your buildings. Enhance your gameplay by pairing buildings with powerful Cabinet Member cards, unlocking unique synergies and diverse strategies to outwit your opponents.

Navigate the Halls of Parliament

Prepare for Parliament Sessions by acquiring Blueprints to construct pivotal buildings. Assemble a dynamic Cabinet to secure your place as a master city planner and politician.

Win the Election

Outmaneuver your rivals and dominate the political landscape to emerge victorious in the ultimate city-building showdown!

Fill Up Your Roster

Unlock a vibrant compendium of diverse Cabinet Members, each bringing unique abilities and playstyles to your city-building strategy. Mix and match to create the ultimate team and dominate the political arena!

developers: That One Time I Made A Game Studio
name: Majulah

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K | AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 970 (4 GB) | AMD® Radeon™ RX 480 (8 GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit | Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-12600K | AMD® Ryzen™ 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 3080 (10 GB) | AMD® Radeon™ RX 6800 XT (16 GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

publishers: That One Time I Made A Game Studio
short_description: Build and govern a thriving Singapore in this city builder! Plan your city with tactical building placements, Recruit a powerful Cabinet, and secure Building Blueprints during heated parliament sessions. Rally citizen support to ensure re-election and shape your nation's future one term at a time!
